title: Michigan's Top Draft Prospect: Aidan Hutchinson
description:
Adam starts off this week's podcast with a deep dive into Michigan's DE, Aidan Hutchinson, who is projected to be taken in the top 5 of the 2022 NFL Draft before Aidan himself joins the show to detail this experience. After that, one of the men Aidan watches closely, 49ers DE Nick Bosa, joins the show to talk about the Comeback Player of the Year and the season the 49ers have been having. Adam wraps up with a lookahead to next week's matchups and fantasy football playoffs.
